mapper.insert: insert into plan(plan_no, plan_name, start_date, end_date, transport, id, days) values(plan_sq.nextval, #{plan_name}, to_date(#{start_date}), to_date(#{end_date}), #{transport}, #{id}, ${days})
mapper.select: select place_no, place_name, place_addr, latitude, longitude, content, rate, to_char(writedate, 'MM-DD'), id, thumbnail from place order by place_no asc
select place_no, place_name, place_addr, latitude, longitude, content, rate, to_char(writedate, 'MM-DD'), id, thumbnail from place where place_name like '%${param1}%' order by place_no asc
